name: Manually_Fix_Research_Tree
title: Manually Fix Research Tree
author: What42Pizza
description:
This mod allows you to fix a broken research tree with very little coding. Just download this mod then unzip this and look at 'research fixes.lua'. It only allows you to change the prerequisites and needed science packs, but that's probably enough.

I don't actually have a use for this, but someone else probably will.
